title: Client Issue
body: I'm not sure but i get this a lot. Here is a picture of what occurs. It happens when i go to select a q or sometimes when i click on my profile. Not sure what it is. Any ideas/help?

replies.body:
Hmmm....Is this definitely not a common error message to receive.  Has it been consistently happening over the course of the day?  Or is this something that happened for a few games and then disappeared?

Reply back and let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vENwpyyX,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-05T21:55:23.379+0000)
>
> Hmmm....Is this definitely not a common error message to receive.  Has it been consistently happening over the course of the day?  Or is this something that happened for a few games and then disappeared?
> 
> Reply back and let me know!

Nice copy and paste message buddy.
This is a reoccurring error message. I kind of just ignore it and nothing bad happens, but it's annoying to get constantly. This is the second day now.  Let me know if there is any way I can help!
This is a reoccurring error message. I kind of just ignore it and nothing bad happens, but it's annoying to get constantly. This is the second day now.

***Edited in lots of details, figured they might help***


My duo "TheOutsideRebel" and I got this for the first time after patching last night. We played some bot games around 11:30 PST to try out new mages (we played Vlad and Veigar in intermediate 5v5 bots) and saw that message before the first game we started. I got it in lobby, he got it in the same time but he wasn't in lobby yet. He's in NYC on a laptop and I'm in Vegas on a desktop, so it's very different setups. We just hit okay, didn't restart, and had no in-game issues, but I thought I'd chime in. Didn't see it for the rest of the night, but haven't played today yet.

Come to think of it, I remember one other strange thing. When I started the client after my patch, it acted like I'd never logged into the client before. It gave me the pop up about how new dynamic queue and hextech crafting works, and then when I clicked on my champ page it didn't default to my usual filter (sort by mastery, owned champs) like it usually does. I figured it was just due to the huge patch.....

I've been getting the same message. I've noticed if I don't relog my friends list looks all weird showing some friends who are not logged in with my online friends (I use the only online friends options). It happens every time I queue for a game after a fresh restart. Nothing game breaking about it or anything. Just tells me I should restart as there might be some problems.
You are not alone, me as well man
Also, I've tried logging out and back in like it said; however, my client crashes when i come back in and try again.
